label: Pearson's Chi-squared Test for Count Data
info: Performs chi-squared contingency table tests and goodness-of-fit tests

categories.label: Input
categories.info: Controls to specify parameters of the test

input_x.label: variable 1
input_x.info: Column selected to perform the test on

input_y.label: variable 2
input_y.info: Column selected to perform the test

input_correct.label: continuity correction
input_correct.info: a logical indicating whether to apply continuity correction when computing the test statistic for 2 by 2 tables: one half is subtracted from all |O - E| differences; however, the correction will not be bigger than the differences themselves. No correction is done if simulate p-value = TRUE.

input_simulatepvalue.label: p-values by Monte Carlo simulation
input_simulatepvalue.info: a logical indicating whether to compute p-values by Monte Carlo simulation

input_B.label: B
input_B.info: an integer specifying the number of replicates used in the Monte Carlo test
